pacman.algorithms

Class MinimaxAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.algorithms.AbstractAlgorithm
      • pacman.algorithms.GreedyAlgorithm
        • pacman.algorithms.AStar
          • pacman.algorithms.MinimaxAlgorithm

  • public class MinimaxAlgorithm
extends AStarAlgorithm
    Defines an algorithm that let the agent applies the minimax algorithm at each step.
    Version:
    1.0

    • Method Detail

      • minimax

        double minimax(int x,
               int y,
               int currDepth,
               boolean isMaximizing,
               int agentIndex)
        The minimax search function.

        Pseudocode:
        function minimax(node, depth, maximizingPlayer) := if depth = 0 or node is a terminal node then return the heuristic value of node if maximizingPlayer then value := -inf for each child of node do value := max(value, minimax(child, depth - 1, FALSE)) return value else (* minimizing player *) value := +inf for each child of node do value := min(value, minimax(child, depth - 1, TRUE)) return value

        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate if the action is applied
        y - the y coordinate if the action is applied
        currDepth - the depth of searching in the recursive function
        isMaximizing - if the searching is trying to maximizing the player
        agentIndex - the index of the agent
        Returns:
        the minimax evaluation score for the current state

      • minimax

        double minimax(int x,
               int y,
               int currDepth,
               boolean isMaximizing,
               java.lang.String agentName,
               boolean isScared)
        The minimax search function.

        Pseudocode:
        function minimax(node, depth, maximizingPlayer) := if depth = 0 or node is a terminal node then return the heuristic value of node if maximizingPlayer then value := -inf for each child of node do value := max(value, minimax(child, depth - 1, FALSE)) return value else (* minimizing player *) value := +inf for each child of node do value := min(value, minimax(child, depth - 1, TRUE)) return value

        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate if the action is applied
        y - the y coordinate if the action is applied
        currDepth - the depth of searching in the recursive function
        isMaximizing - if the searching is trying to maximizing the player
        agentName - the name of the agent
        isScared - if the ghost is scared
        Returns:
        the minimax evaluation score for the current state
